message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than $9000. How about $10500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're a serious buyer, Bob! I can meet you halfway between $9500 and $10500. How about $10000?
I'm glad you're willing to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I really like the product, but I'm trying to stay within a budget. Can you do any better than $10000?
